riverguides.name: Daniel Stone
riverguides.biography: Daniel loves the outdoors! He is a lover of water and wants to gain more and more experience. If you are new to this, Daniel is the man for you!

riverguides.name: Amanda Head
riverguides.biography: Jeff is always looking for an adventure. He has some experience on the water and will always be looking for that rapid you will tell your children about!

riverguides.name: Justin King
riverguides.biography: There is no better man for you than the King. Justin has been doing this for longer than some of you children have been alive. Let him take you on a wild ride.
